sentences.en: A few remarks must finally be made concerning the calibration of scintillation detectors.
sentences.cn: 最后需要讲几点关于闪烁探测器校正方面的注意事项.

sentences.en: Check calibration of gloss meter with standard test block.
sentences.cn: 检查光泽米的定标以标准测试块.

sentences.en: CMM Calibration - The forum to discuss CMM Calibration ideas experiences, concerns and solutions.
sentences.cn: CMM校准 - 论坛讨论CMM校准的经验 、 疑问和结果.

sentences.en: Function test and calibration self - heterodyne curve for direction finder on sea trial.
sentences.cn: 航行试验中测向仪效用试验及自差曲线校正.

sentences.en: I believe the solution lies in the calibration rather than the design.
sentences.cn: 我相信解决的方法在面板厚度校正的技术,而不是力木的设计.

sentences.en: I view a very practical one, a calibration method.
sentences.cn: 本人看法:很实用的一本书, 给出了calibration的方法.

sentences.en: It is advisable to check the instrument by frequent calibration.
sentences.cn: 最好通过经常的校准来检查仪器.

sentences.en: Linear calibration models are introduced to improve the accuracy of the instrument.
sentences.cn: 同时为了提高测量精度,引入了线性校正模型.

sentences.en: Release the Foot Switch when the Calibration Indicator reaches its set position.
sentences.cn: 当刻度指示器指向规定的位置,放开脚踏板.

sentences.en: Repeat the preparation of standards starting with pure solutions until successive calibration curves agree within 10 %.
sentences.cn: 重复配制标准溶液(从纯溶液开始)直至逐次的标准曲线彼此偏差均在10%以内.

sentences.en: Sensitivity can be controlled easily because TS has Auto - calibration function.
sentences.cn: 因为TS具有自校准功能,所以灵敏度可以很容易的控制.

sentences.en: The instrument is very delicate for general calibration purposes.
sentences.cn: 这种仪器作为一般的标定是很精确的.

sentences.en: The torquing current is measured and related to drift rate by prior calibration data.
sentences.cn: 测出产生力矩的电流,然后根据事先校正的数据来算出飘移率.

sentences.en: These data can be plotted to form a calibration curve.
sentences.cn: 这些数据可以绘制成一校准曲线.

sentences.en: This is necessary because the loads are usually applied normal to the calibration fixture surface.
sentences.cn: 之所以有此需要,是因为所加载荷通常是垂直于校准装置平面的.

words.tran_cn: 校准（calibrate的过去分词）；校准使...标准化

phrases.tran_cn: 标定方法，校估方法；校准法

trans.tran_cn: 校准，标准化，刻度，标度，测量口径
trans.tran_en: the process of checking or slightly changing an instrument or tool so that it does something correctly
